info_template.sql:
SELECT
    hoehe,
    punktzeichen_txt AS punktzeichen,
    typ_txt AS kategorie,
    nummer as fixpunktnummer,
    ST_X(geometrie) AS x,
    ST_Y(geometrie) AS y,
    t_id AS _fid_,
    ST_AsText(geometrie) AS wkt_geom
FROM
    agi_mopublic_pub.mopublic_fixpunkt
WHERE 
    ST_Intersects(geometrie, ST_Buffer(ST_GeomFromText('POINT(:x :y)', :srid), :resolution * :FI_POLYGON_TOLERANCE))
